description:
FUDGEFudge provides (Python based) tools to:
• Store and modify nuclear data.
• Convert ENDF-6 formatted nuclear data [1] into Generalized Nuclear
Data (GND) structure [2].
• Convert LLNL’s ENDL formatted nuclear data [3] into GND.
• Plot data from GND files.
• Check for physics problems in GND files.
• Process nuclear data for use by Monte Carlo and/or deterministic
codes. Fudge contains hooks for the future addition of nuclear data
processing routines.
The Fudge release includes samples of published ENDF-6 formatted data that
can be converted to the new GND format.
This software is the next release in a series of releases that began with GND
version 0.1 [2].
name: fudge
